news.title: Nvidia turned CoreWeave into a major player in AI years before helping to save its IPO
news.summary: CoreWeave has found a big market in selling Nvidia's popular AI processors. But the company has a challenging story to sell to public investors.

news.title: In Trump era, companies are rebranding DEI efforts, not giving up
news.summary: Most companies are continuing related work, but shifting the language. Most companies are not changing the name of their products. They are just changing the language they use.

news.title: Why tariffs could push car prices even higher
news.summary: Tariffs will likely push car prices past the record highs seen in recent years. Tariffs are expected to be the biggest factor in the rise in car prices.

news.title: Novo Nordisk's diabetes pill slashes risk of cardiovascular complications by 14% after four years
news.summary: The results pave the way for Rybelsus to become a new treatment option for people living with diabetes and established heart disease. The results are expected to be published in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology.

news.title: Elon Musk says xAI has acquired X in deal that values social media site at $33 billion
news.summary: Elon Musk says his startup xAI has acquired his social media company X. In a social media post on Friday, Musk said xAI had acquired X.
